content: निज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नितरां जायते निजण्-ड] {@--1@} Innate, indigenous, native, inborn, congenial. {@--2@} Own, one's own, relating to one-self, of one's own party or country; निजं वपुः पुनरनयन्निजां रुचिं <ls>Śi. 17. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 15</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 27</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 50.</ls> {@--3@} Peculiar. {@--4@} Continual, perpetual. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> One's own people.
